mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (select a.downid, a.sm_serialphones, a.sm_content, a.sm_ismgtype, a.sm_servicecode, to_char(a.sm_sendtime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') sm_sendtime, a.sm_batchno, a.sm_servicename, to_char(a.downtime, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') downtime, a.sendlevel, a.taskstatus from EFD_SMDOWN a where a.sm_sendtime <= sysdate and a.taskstatus = 0 order by sendlevel desc, downtime) t where rownum <= 1000

select a.cust_id,a.cust_code,a.cust_name,a.passwd,a.client_ip, a.audit_flag,a.threads,a.blacklist_filter,a.sensitive_words_filter, a.parent_id,a.status,a.create_time,a.create_by,b.send_rate from t_sms_customer a left join t_sms_customer_parameter b on a.cust_id = b.cust_id where a.cust_id = #{value} and status = '1'
mapper.insert: insert into EFD_SMRPT t (rptid, downid,sm_serialno, sm_recvphone,sm_content,sm_ismgtype,sm_servicecode,sm_sendtime, sm_batchno,sm_servicename,downtime,sendcode,sendlevel, gatewayno,messageid,sendtime,res_status, res_time,rpt_status,rpt_time,rpt_code,subtime,pknumber,pktotal,markinfo) values (emp_rptid.nextval,#{downid},#{sm_serialno}, #{sm_recvphone},#{sm_content},#{sm_ismgtype},#{sm_servicecode}, to_date(#{sm_sendtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{sm_batchno},#{sm_servicename}, to_date(#{downtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{sendcode},#{sendlevel},#{gatewayno},#{messageid}, to_date(#{sendtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{res_status}, to_date(#{res_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{rpt_status}, to_date(#{rpt_time}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{rpt_code}, sysdate,#{pknumber},#{pktotal},#{markinfo})
mapper.update: update EFD_SMDOWN set taskstatus = 0 where taskstatus = 3
mapper.insert: insert into EFD_SMUP (upid, createtime,fullcode, sm_servicecode,upphone,upcontent,uptime,ismgtype, gatewayno) values (EMP_efd_upid.nextval,sysdate,#{fullcode}, #{sm_servicecode},#{upphone},#{upcontent}, to_date(#{uptime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'),#{ismgtype},#{gatewayno})

select a.mob_pref_id, a.provider_id, a.mobile_prefix from t_provider_mobile_prefix a where instr(#{value}, h.mobile_prefix )>0
